title: QA-Kayser T-Cross Generator Certificate: Kosmogonie Structure
abstract: This certificate establishes the structural correspondence between Kayser's T-Cross cosmogonic diagram (Harmonikale Kosmogonie, §54) and QA's generator algebra. The T-Cross shows APEIRON (unlimited) emanating into finite harmonic structures via ratio grids and diagonal projections. QA's Fibonacci generator similarly partitions pattern space into finite orbits (24/8/1 hierarchy) with tuple derivation matching the T-Cross projection geometry.

qa_mapping.apeiron: Pattern space Ω - source of all possible states
qa_mapping.horizontal_grid: (b, e) state space organized by mod-9 digital roots
qa_mapping.vertical_axis: Fibonacci generator partitioning space into finite orbits
qa_mapping.diagonals: Tuple derivation: d = b+e, a = b+2e

validated_correspondences.name: Axis Partition Structure
validated_correspondences.kayser_claim: T-Cross vertical axis represents APEIRON→PERAS transition
validated_correspondences.qa_claim: Fibonacci generator partitions state space into distinct orbit classes
validated_correspondences.test: Enumerate orbits under digital root Fibonacci step

validated_correspondences.name: Horizontal Ratio Grid
validated_correspondences.kayser_claim: T-Cross crossbar contains Lambdoma organized by primes 2 and 3
validated_correspondences.qa_claim: QA 9×9 grid organized by mod-3 classification
validated_correspondences.test: Verify structural constants derive from 2 and 3
validated_correspondences.expected: Modulus, periods, totals are powers of 2 and 3

validated_correspondences.name: APEIRON/PERAS Duality
validated_correspondences.test: Verify ratio structure of orbit periods

validated_correspondences.name: Tetraktys Structure
validated_correspondences.qa_claim: QA orbit counts exhibit tetraktys-like power structure
validated_correspondences.test: Analyze pair counts by prime factorization

validated_correspondences.name: Diagonal Projections
validated_correspondences.kayser_claim: Diagonals project derived harmonics from ratio grid
validated_correspondences.qa_claim: QA tuple derivation: (b,e) → (d,a) via linear projection
validated_correspondences.test: Verify projection geometry matches T-Cross structure
validated_correspondences.actual: d = b+e (45° diagonal), a = b+2e (steeper diagonal), a-d = e

apeiron.qa_analog: Pattern space Ω before generator action

peras.qa_analog: Finite orbit achieved after generator iteration

tuple_geometry.invariant: a - d = e (constant along Fibonacci evolution)

certificate_summary.key_finding: T-Cross geometry maps to QA generator algebra via shared prime structure (2, 3)
